title: Furious Celebs Go Dating matchmakers slam Stephen Bear for ditching girl at dinner - leaving her to pay bill
text:
Get celebs   Could   
Stephen Bear was slated on Celebs Go Dating this evening. 
The reality hunk shocked fans yesterday by ditching a girl he'd taken out, just eight minutes into their date. 
On last night's episode, poor Stacey had no idea he had left the restaurant, leaving her to pay for the food he'd ordered. 
Afterwards, she phoned up dating agents Nadia and Eden to tell them everything - and they were not happy. Stephen Bear was slated on Celebs Go Dating (Photo: E4) 
"When [Stacey] called us, she did not feel nice about herself at all," fumed Nadia. "She was raging. Her voice was shaking! You made her feel like s**t. Read More 
"In fact, you haven't made any of your dates feel nice. They've all given us the same feedback; that you're a liar, a player and full of s**t. Nadia and Eden were furious with the reality star (Photo: E4) 
"The fact that you didn't see through this date shows that you are not learning and you are not growing. How are you ever going to find the one like this?" 
Eden was just as angry with Bear and gave him a huge telling off for his behaviour. Nadia gave Bear a serious ticking off (Photo: E4) 
"A real man would never treat a woman like that," he snapped. 
However, after the stern words, Bear finally appeared to feel remorseful. Bear admitted he is a 'player' (Photo: E4) 
"I use girls and I can't help it," he admitted. "I don't like this person I am today, it's not very nice." 
Luckily, the matchmakers were willing to take another chance on Bear and set hip up on another date.
